page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT TRENDS IN SHAW
page.content: 72 people living in the Shaw area were asked about their employment.The aim of the survey was to find out:{a)} whether the people who live in Shaw,work in Shaw,{b)}where those people who don't work in Shaw,do work, {c)}what percentage still work in the textile industry,which was the main source of employment in the early part of this century. { {a)}Only 33.3% work in Shaw. {b)}41.7% work in the surrounding areas of Oldham.7% work in Rochdale.11% travelled to Manchester.The remaining 7% travelled even further afield to Tameside,Darwen and Altrincham. {c)}9.7% work in the textile industry but only one person works in Shaw.
